name: INSearchForMessagesIntentHandling
desc: An interface that handles requests to search the current user’s messages.

items.name: func resolveRecipients(for: INSearchForMessagesIntent, with: ([INPersonResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when they search for messages sent to specific people.

items.name: func resolveSenders(for: INSearchForMessagesIntent, with: ([INPersonResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when they search for messages sent by specific people.

items.name: func resolveAttributes(for: INSearchForMessagesIntent, with: (INMessageAttributeOptionsResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when they search for messages with specific attributes.

items.name: func resolveDateTimeRange(for: INSearchForMessagesIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when they search for messages sent in a specific time period.

items.name: func resolveSpeakableGroupNames(for: INSearchForMessagesIntent, with: ([INSpeakableStringResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when they search for messages sent to a specific group of people.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSearchForMessagesIntent, completion: (INSearchForMessagesIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can perform the search.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSearchForMessagesIntent, completion: (INSearchForMessagesIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Performs the search and returns the results.
